plays.text: Penalty to Daniel Alfredsson 2 minutes for Roughing Andy Sutton
Goal scored by Daniel Alfredsson assisted by Todd White and Petr Schastlivy
Penalty to Wade Redden 2 minutes for Tripping(opposing player not identified)
Goal scored by Slava Kozlov assisted by Andy Sutton and Ilya Kovalchuk
Penalty to Zdeno Chara 2 minutes for Closing Hand on Puck(opposing player not identified)
Penalty to Dany Heatley 2 minutes for Roughing(opposing player not identified)
Penalty to Chris Tamer 2 minutes for High Sticking Brad Smyth
Penalty to Jeff Odgers 2 minutes for Holding Peter Schaefer
Penalty to Shaun Van Allen 2 minutes for Roughing Jeff Odgers
Penalty to Jeff Odgers 2 minutes for Roughing Shaun Van Allen served by Brad Tapper
Penalty to Shane Hnidy 2 minutes for Obstruction - Interference Ilya Kovalchuk
Penalty to Jody Hull 2 minutes for Crosschecking Jeff Farkas
Goal scored by Todd White assisted by Daniel Alfredsson and Karel Rachunek
Goal scored by Tony Hrkac assisted by Richard Smehlik and Slava Kozlov
Goal scored by Anton Volchenkov unassisted
Penalty to Mike Weaver 2 minutes for Boarding Daniel Alfredsson
Goal scored by Brad Tapper assisted by Pascal Rheaume and Richard Smehlik
